Topic.Title: Timer Script Output not Aligning with Command Bar [Solved]

Posts.EditableText: When a message is output from within a timer script, there doesn't appear to be any subsequent realignment of the command bar, so it (and some of the text) can disappear off the bottom of the screen. Scrolling will bring it back but it would be better if alignment occurred automatically. Is this a known bug? Is there a workaround?

Posts.EditableText:
You mean a JS timer?
Try using `addTextAndScroll()` rather than `addText()`.
